steps.title: Starting with the paper
steps.description: Take a piece of paper and lay it flat on the table. Ensure that the edges are straight and the paper is evenly spread out.

steps.title: Creating a crease
steps.description: Fold the paper in half along one of its edges. Make sure the fold is clean and straight, creating a crisp crease in the center.

steps.title: Making a mountain fold
steps.description: Bring the two ends of the paper together and press them down firmly. This will create a mountain fold, where the paper is folded upwards in the center.

steps.title: Creating a valley fold
steps.description: Fold the paper back out along the same edge where you made the mountain fold. This will create a valley fold, where the paper is folded downwards in the center.

steps.title: Making another mountain fold
steps.description: Bring the two ends of the paper together again and press them down firmly. This will create another mountain fold.

steps.title: Creating a valley fold
steps.description: Fold the paper back out along the same edge where you made the mountain fold. This will create another valley fold.

steps.title: Making a final mountain fold
steps.description: Bring the two ends of the paper together once more and press them down firmly. This will create a final mountain fold.

steps.title: Creating a valley fold
steps.description: Fold the paper back out along the same edge where you made the final mountain fold. This will create a final valley fold.

steps.title: Making a final mountain fold
steps.description: Bring the two ends of the paper together once more and press them down firmly. This will create a final mountain fold.

steps.title: Creating a valley fold
steps.description: Fold the paper back out along the same edge where you made the final mountain fold. This will create a final valley fold.
